subject: Soccer
NCAA Soccer Championships
College Athletics
Coaches and Managers
Colleges and Universities
lead_paragraph: Elmar Bolowich, who left North Carolina’s soccer program last February to coach at Creighton, could face his former team for the N.C.A.A. championship.
snippet: Elmar Bolowich, who left North Carolina’s soccer program last February to coach at Creighton, could face his former team for the N.C.A.A. championship.
